text: Live is an American rock band formed in York, Pennsylvania in 1984. == Band members == * Ed Kowalczyk - lead vocals, rhythm guitar (1989-present) * Chad Taylor - lead guitar, backing vocals (1989-present) * Patrick Dahlheimer - bass, backing vocals (1989-present) * Chad Gracey - drums (1989-present) == Other websites == Category:1984 establishments in the United States Category:Alternative rock bands Category:American hard rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 1984 Category:Musical groups from Pennsylvania Category:Musical quartets Category:Post-grunge bands
title: Live (band)
